text: Reggio di Calabria Aeroporto is a railway station in Reggio Calabria serving Reggio Calabria Airport, Italy. The station is located on the Jonica railway . The train services are operated by Trenitalia. The station lies 1 km from the airport; there is a free shuttle bus service between the two. ==Train services== The station is served by the following service(s):Calabria region train timetables *Regional services (Treno regionale) Cantanzaro Lido - Roccella Jonica - Melito di Porto Salvo - Reggio Calabria *Metropolitan services (Treno regionale) Rosarno - Villa San Giovanni - Reggio Calabria - Melito di Porto Salvo ==References== Category:Railway stations in Calabria Category:Buildings and structures in the Province of Reggio Calabria Category:Airport railway stations in Italy Category:Railway stations opened in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in Italy
title: Reggio di Calabria Aeroporto railway station
